Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when another 2 or more
"GT Heroes" Category allies are on the team*
- {passiveImg:once}Launches an additional Super Attack and all attacks
become critical hits for 1 turn
- {passiveImg:once}Super Class allies' Ki +3 and DEF 70%{passiveImg:up_g} for 4 turns
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 300%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained
- Attacks are effective against all Types
- High chance of performing a critical hit
- Guards all attacks
- Damage reduction rate 50%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*When attacking*
- ATK 300%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When receiving an attack*
- DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When receiving a Super Attack*
- DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g} temporarily
*When receiving a Ki Blast Super Attack*
- Great chance of nullifying it and countering with
tremendous power
- Nullifies it and counters with tremendous power
when HP is 70% or less
*After receiving 3 or more attacks in battle*
- {passiveImg:forever}Launches an additional Super Attack
starting from the character's next attacking turn
*After receiving 7 or more attacks in battle*
- {passiveImg:forever}Ki +4
- {passiveImg:forever}Performs a critical hit

7735.superDescription:
Raises ATK for 1 turn 
with a great chance of further 
greatly raising ATK for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

7736.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK for 4 turns 
with a great chance of further 
massively raising ATK for 1 turn and 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Dragon Fist
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Massively raises ATK temporarily and 
causes ultimate damage to enemy; 
ATK & DEF +70% and all attacks 
become critical hits for 1 turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated starting from next attacking turn 
after the character receives an attack (once only)
